titleStmt.title: The terrestriall paradise, or, Happinesse on earth. Written by Robert Crofts
titleStmt.author: R. C. (Robert Crofts)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Harper for William Aderton, and are to be sold at his shop in Duck-lane,

notesStmt.note: With an additional title page, engraved: "The terrestriall paradise or Happines on earth.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
